controllers

Class ControllerMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.ControllerMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public final class ControllerMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Classe em design pattern Singleton, que gera o Controller principal do servidor, em design pattern MVC.
    Author:
    Grupo ECP7AN-MCA1-09 - Bruno Gama, Guilherme Sant'Clair, Luis Felipe, Rafael Cassiolato, Raiza Morata.
